name: myopathy
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a disease of the muscles: The patient is suffering from cardiac myopathy.
More examplesFewer examplesThe tests are useful in diagnosing myopathy.The drug may cause myopathy if used in high doses.Alcoholic myopathy can occur after a bout of heavy drinking.They studied patients with muscular dystrophies and other myopathies.
